This is related to shuffling code around for windows ia64 port. Szymon can you investigate?
Yes John. I'm looking at it.

In creating the new fragments for ia64, the wrong version of the dll was added to the x86 fragment.  I have released the correct fragment.  Other than a log entry per project, I haven't noticed any other side-effects.  When the native refresh support is missing, it automatically falls back to a polling-based implementation used on other platforms.
*** Bug 211434 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

(In reply to comment #3)
> Needs a rebuild, IMO.
> 
+1
It will be included to the next I-build.
